create-user.title: Create User
create-user.login-link: Already have an account? Click here to log in

login.title: Log in to your account
login.create-account-link: Don't have an account? Click here to create one

start-game.title: Cobra
start-game.movement-description-keys: Use the arrow keys or W, A, S, D to move the snake
start-game.movement-description-mobile: If on mobile or tablet you can swipe the screen or use the buttons below
start-game.points-description-red: The red apple is normal and gives you 100 points
start-game.points-description-yellow: The yellow apple makes you go slower for 5 seconds and it gives you 80 points
start-game.points-description-blue: The blue apple makes you go faster for 5 seconds and it gives you 150 points
start-game.points-saved: Your score will be saved after the game is over
start-game.start-game-text: Click the button below to start the game
